title: Cannot buy champion in shop
body: The client says i have 4900 IP and so i tried to buy Ezreal. On the store page however it says i dont have enough IP http://imgur.com/kmTxb0T

replies.body: Uh oh, it looks like your client wasn't able to update your IP values correctly, so I went ahead and forced those numbers to sync up with each other. The next time you log in you should be seeing the right numbers!
